description: Cette opportunité est un appel d'offres de 3 mois pour les services informatiques. Les vendeurs proposés devront fournir des services informatiques complets pour l'implémentation d'une plateforme d'expérience numérique.

full_summary:
**Tenders in the National Capital Region: IT Professional Services for the Digital Experience Platform Implementation**

**Solicitation Number: 23-237021**

The Department of Foreign Affairs, Trade and Development (DFATD) invites suppliers to propose for IT professional services to support the implementation of the Digital Experience Platform (DXP). The requirement is open only to Supply Arrangement (SA) holders who qualified under Tier 1 for services in the National Capital Region.

**Brief Description:**
The procurement is for IT professional services for the implementation of the DXP, which includes the following categories:

* Platform Analyst (Technical Architect)
* Senior Project Manager
* Systems Analyst (Product Owner)
* Systems Analyst (Content/UI Architect)
* Programmer/Analyst (DXP Specialist)
* Quality Assurance Specialist/Analyst
* Platform Analyst (Analytics Specialist)
* Platform Analyst (Personalization Specialist)

**Solicitation Details:**

* Solicitation Method: Competitive - Selective Tendering
* Trade Agreements: World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA), Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA), Agreement on Internal Trade (AIT), Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA), Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement (CColFTA), and Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement (CPanFTA)
* Contract Duration: Two (2) years
* Expected Start Date: 2024-04-01
* Estimated Delivery Date: 2024-04-01
* Estimated Level of Effort: Up to 378 days

**Important Note:**
This solicitation is open to only 15 qualified SA holders who have been invited to submit a proposal. The Department has met the mandatory requirements and is confident that it will receive a sufficient number of proposals to make this a truly competitive process.

**Contact Information:**
If you have any inquiries, please contact Houssam Hannat at houssam.hannat@international.gc.ca. The RFP documents will be e-mailed directly to the qualified SA holders who are being invited to bid.

**Method of Supply:**
The Task-Based Informatics Professional Services (TBIPS) method of supply is refreshed three (3) times per year. If you wish to become a qualified SA holder, please contact RCNMDAI-NCRIMOS@tpsgc.gc.ca.
